channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How A.I. Could Reshape the Economic Geography of America
item.description: As the technology is widely adopted, some once-struggling midsize cities in the Midwest, Mid-Atlantic and South may benefit, new research predicts.

item.title: South Korea’s opposition prepares to impeach the country’s acting president as political crisis deepens
item.description: Han Duck-soo is refusing to fill vacancies on the Constitutional Court, currently evaluating the impeachment of suspended president Yoon Suk Yeol.

item.title: Israel Loosened Its Rules to Bomb Hamas Fighters, Killing Many More Civilians

item.title: Azerbaijan Airlines Jet Crashes in Kazakhstan, Killing Dozens

item.title: Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni and the Brute Force of Celebrity P.R. Tactics
item.description: On the internet, the truth and the manufactured lies about celebrities are hard to sort through.

item.title: Workplace well-being is at an all-time low. Here are 5 ways employers can actually help
item.description: “Without a supportive workplace culture and strong leadership,” says one expert, “even the best perks feel hollow and performative.”

item.title: How Mexican Cartels Test Fentanyl on Vulnerable People and Animals

item.title: Five Journalists Killed in Gaza Strike, Palestinian Officials Say
item.description: The Israeli military said it had struck a vehicle containing a “terrorist cell” in the Nuseirat area of Gaza.

item.title: Will the U.S. Ever Be Ready for a Female President?

item.title: China’s finance, property firm workforces shrink for first time
item.description: China's gloomy job market has been one of the key reasons stopping people from spending more.

item.title: Looking to refinance your FHA mortgage? Make it easier and cheaper with a streamline refinance.
item.description: If you have an FHA, VA, or USDA home loan, a streamline refinance mortgage could lower your fees and get it done faster.
